title: Italian sausage lasagne
ingredients: ['12 uncooked lasagne sheets', '500g fresh Italian sausage, casings removed', '100g chopped onions', '1/2 tablespoon minced garlic', '40g chopped fresh parsley, divided', '1 300g jar tomato puree', '300g passata', '500ml water', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried Italian herbs', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried basil leaves', '500g ricotta cheese', '300g frozen spinach, thawed and squeeze dried', '50g grated Parmesan cheese', '3 eggs', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '350g grated mozzarella cheese']
